sn29.4:1.2: Atha kho annataro bhikkhu yena bhagava …pe… ekamantam nisinno kho so bhikkhu bhagavantam etadavoca:
sn29.4:1.3: “ko nu kho, bhante, hetu, ko paccayo, yena m’idhekacce jalabuja naga uposatham upavasanti vossatthakaya ca bhavanti”ti?
sn29.4:1.5: “Ayam kho, bhikkhu, hetu, ayam paccayo, yena m’idhekacce jalabuja naga uposatham upavasanti vossatthakaya ca bhavanti”ti.
